amendment.description: Amendment, as modified, increases the Department of Justice, Community Oriented Policing Services (COPS) by $298,000,000 and reduces the amount for NASA by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 125 printed in the Congressional Record to increase the Department of Justice, Community Oriented Policing Services by $298,000,000 and reducing the NASA by $298,000,000.

action.text: Weiner amendment (A017) modified by unanimous consent. The modication makes a technical correction.
On agreeing to the Weiner amendment (A017) as modified Agreed to by recorded vote: 228 - 203 (Roll no. 53).
